ModMetaData.name: Medicines? Medication?
ModMetaData.author: emyylii
ModMetaData.description:
adds a few new medical drugs to the game for those people that wanted more...
Spaceacillin - A very useful medicine, effective treatment for many diseases and infections.
Metabolism: +200% Immunity gain speed: +60%
Inaprovaline - A synthetic drug developed for oxygenating the blood, significantly improves respiratory and circulatory functions.
Blood Pumping: + 115% Breathing: +110%
Tricordrazine - A synthetic drug developed as an intense pain killer and mild stimulant.
Pain: x15% Consciousness: +10%
